title: gofmt makes many new lines from many semicolons
body:
by **thwilloch**: 
1. consider http://play.golang.org/p/yRQP8eg6Bx
2. click format
3. click format once more

What is the expected output?
that all the semicolons at the end of line disappears

What do you see instead?
Many blank lines.
If you run gofmt/click format once more then all the blank lines collapses to only one.
